title: Show count for eggs only, weight for all other products

requirements.summary: Display numeric count for egg products, weight for all others in ProductCard
acceptanceCriteria: Egg products (matched by name or category containing 'egg', case-insensitive) display a numeric count (e.g., '6 pcs') instead of weight.
All non-egg products continue to display weight with the Scale icon as before.
The count label uses a suitable icon or label to distinguish it from the weight display.
The change is reflected consistently in ProductCard wherever it is rendered (QuickAddEssentials, FlashDeals, ProductCatalog, etc.).

file_operations.description: Add conditional logic to detect egg products by checking if product.name or product.category contains 'egg' (case-insensitive). For egg products, display a numeric count (e.g., '6 pcs', '12 pcs') with a suitable icon (e.g., Hash or Package icon from lucide-react) instead of the Scale icon and weight. For all other products, preserve the existing weight display with Scale icon. Ensure the count value is derived from the product's weight field (e.g., if weight is '6', display '6 pcs'). The visual styling should remain consistent with the existing design.
